channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It's the Economy, Donald
item.description: As US labor and inflation data seemingly worsen, the White House refrain is “no panicans”—in other words, no room for panic. That isn't keeping everyo...

item.title: Government Staffing Cuts Have Fueled an Ant-Smuggling Boom
item.description: “It’s getting out of hand,” one seller says. “They realize the US market is a gold mine.”

item.title: How DOGE Set Up a Shadow X Account for a Government Agency
item.description: In February, DOGE affiliates at the SBA set up an X account and solicited whistleblower complaints. “It’s like having a crazy uncle who decides to be ...

item.title: AI Isn’t Coming for Hollywood. It Has Already Arrived
item.description: An early winner in the generative AI wars was near collapse—then bet everything on a star-studded comeback. Can Stability AI beat the competition?

item.title: I Went to an AI Film Festival Screening and Left With More Questions Than Answers
item.description: Runway AI paired up with Imax to screen 10 AI-generated winning selections. The festival has been derided by some cinephiles, while others insist it’s...

item.title: Meta is shaking up its AI org, again
item.description: On Friday, The Information reported that Meta was preparing to tear down its existing AI org and reorganize it into four new groups. Four days later, ...

item.title: Made by Google 2025: How to watch Google debut the Pixel 10, Pixel Watch 4, and more
item.description: Google is hosting its Pixel 10 event next week. Learn how to watch the tech giant reveal its new mobile devices and what else you can expect.

item.title: Deel scores a lawsuit win, but not against Rippling
item.description: While Deel is calling this a "Rippling-aligned" suit, it's not the lawsuit filed by Rippling involving an alleged corporate spy.

item.title: Appeals court says NLRB structure unconstitutional, in a win for SpaceX
item.description: SpaceX scored a win in a decision from the Fifth Circuit over the labor board's structure.

item.title: Google pays $30M to settle lawsuit over children’s YouTube data
item.description: Google has agreed to pay $30M to settle a lawsuit over children's data collection, though the company denies wrongdoing.
